content: Other times, he’ll perform a feinting strike by leaping to one side of you with an uppercut, and then changing direction to slam down after a delay in your direction.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Battle - Mad Tiger'.
The content is as follows:
Other times, he’ll perform a feinting strike by leaping to one side of you with an uppercut, and then changing direction to slam down after a delay in your direction.
